root.name: Zumba Fitness 2
root.description: SummaryZumba Fitness 2 is the second game in the Zumba Fitness franchise.Zumba Fitness 2 features 24 different dance styles and "more than 32" Zumba routines , an increase of 15 dance styles and 2 routines over the original Zumba Fitness release. ZF 2 includes all new music including new tracks from Pitbull and Nicole Scherzinger.Zumba Pioneer Beto Perez, Gena Grant and Tanya Beardsley return to lead the player through exercises. ZF 2 allows hands-free dancing with the pack-in Zumba Fitness Belt and also keeps track of how many calories the player burns with the new Calorie Tracker.ZF 2 released for the Nintendo Wii on 11/15/2011.
